verbose_text: ACE2 acts as functional SARS-CoV-2 receptor, which leads to a downregulation of ACE2 and a higher expression of Ang II. ACE2 is predominantly expressed by vascular endothelial cells of the lung, but also in extrapulmonary tissue, heart, nervous system, intestine, kidneys, blood vessels, and muscles on cell surfaces, which may explain the multiorgan dysfunction observed in patients with COVID-19.
